TestCase.TestCaseTitle: Link IED explosion Event to IED discovery Event.
TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Test whether the Producer/Provider is able to create new IED explosion Event linking it to an existing IED discovery Event and the Consumers/Receivers are able to understand (and display) it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: The Producer creates an IED discovery Event with specific activity information. The Consumers receive the information and interpret it correctly. The Producer creates an IED explosion Event which is linked to the previously created IED discovery Event. The Consumers receive the information and interpret it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: The Producer/Provider has created a topic which includes message elements belonging to the Event message schema area. The Consumers have subscribed to this topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success once a newly created IED discovery Event is exchanged, followed by a newly created IED explosion which is "linked" to the IED Discovery and all the information is processed and interpreted correctly on all Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction:
The Producer (1) creates an IEDEvent with name XXX_IEDD_918 and with the following activity information: * IncidentCode = 'IEDDiscovery' * GeometricDefinition
Notices: XXX in name of the object is meant (in principle) to be replaced by the 3 letter code of the country name. Example for the name of the IEDEvent: ESP_ IEDD_918.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers (2) receive and display the IEDEvent correctly.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction:
The Producer (1) creates an IEDEvent with name XXX_IEDE_918 and with the following activity information: * IncidentCode = 'IEDExplosion' * GeometricDefinition same as for ESP_ IEDD_918 * CommentText = 'linked to ESP_ IEDD_918'
Notices: Example for the name of the IEDEvent: ESP_ IEDE_918. Source Element (originator of the information) must remain the same as for IED Discovery
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers (2) receive and display the IEDEvent correctly.
